header.name: chaos/preprocessor/control/iif.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that acts as an "if-else" construct.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to one of two alternatives depending on its first argument.

usage.param: The condition that determines whether the macro expands to t or __VA_ARGS__. Valid values are 0 and 1.
The result of the expansion if bit is 1.
The result of the expansion if bit is 0.
The condition that determines whether the macro expands to t or f. Valid values are 0 and 1.
The result of the expansion if bit is 1.
The result of the expansion if bit is 0.

macro.para: If bit expands to 0, this macro expands to f or __VA_ARGS__. Otherwise, it expands to t.
This macro does not perform a boolean conversion on bit. If the conversion is desired, should be used instead.
This macro is lazy. If bit is 1, only t is evaluated. Likewise, if bit is 0, only f (or __VA_ARGS__) is evaluated.
